adviseScripts.text: Hey, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'm so jealous that you can swim.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I actually prefer staying out of the water.
Then let's go swim, just like you mentioned.
Oh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Then how about you come and help me cut up some watermelons?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: You don't have to rub it in...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Fine, I'll stay here and watch you swim.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: But you've gotta come back and hang out with me once you're done!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I have a good time with Anis.
Check out the sky.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Don't you think sunset is prettier than sunrise?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: How about we crack open a soda and take in the sunset?
It is, but neither of them is more beautiful than you.
Sounds great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Here, take a seat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: So, if I'm not mistaken,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: you would say that to every girl you meet, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I have a good time with Anis.
Oh no, it's finally happening!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'm running out of soda!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: How can I live without my precious carbonated beverages?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: How about I give you some of mine?
You can take this as an opportunity to wean yourself off of soda and drink more water.
Commander...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: What an awesome guy you are!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: If you're gonna lecture me, at least give me a bottle of soda first.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I give Anis a bottle of soda and continue to chat with her for a while.
Firepower is for ordinary occasions, and waterpower is for when she's out at sea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I wonder what new variations will appear in the future?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: That's probably all of them.
What about windpower?
Apparently you don't know Neon that well, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I think there are many more variations which have yet to appear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Sounds like you know Neon pretty well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I can see it now; her ascending to the top of a mountain peak and starting to clamor for windpower training.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: ... Makes me exhausted just thinking about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis and I talk about Neon for a while.
Ugh, the sun is baking me alive.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: How are you holding up, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Waddya say we both take shelter under this beach umbrella?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'm fine. I applied sunscreen.
Much appreciated.
Ah, so you've lubed yourself up beforehand, have you? Admirable perspicacity...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: ... but a bit boring.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I don't know if the umbrella is too small, or you're too bulky, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: You're hardly half-covered.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: We'll have to get closer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis and I deliberate over different ways to shade ourselves from the sun.
Commander! Look over here!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Isn't the color of this shell lovely?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: It's the same color as your hair.
It's similar to Rapi's hair.
Is it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I suppose it is a beige hue. No wonder I was drawn to it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to take it with me when we go back.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Hey! What are you mentioning Rapi for?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: My hair's brown too, y'know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: That was super insensitive of you! I'm really put out right now...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis and I continue to hunt for shells for a while.
Hey, Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: sorry to bother you so late at night,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: but I couldn't sleep.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Do you want me to sing you a lullaby?
Want to hang out for a while?
A lullaby? Seriously?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Don't be such a goof.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Let's just hang out for a while.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Is that okay?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: You're not too tired? Awesome!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: What should we do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis and I have a fun time hanging out for the evening.
Ahhh, isn't the sea wonderful?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I wonder if I was a fish in my previous life?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Fish can swim though.
You may be onto something.
Good point.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Maybe I was a grain of sand then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I must have gotten my fill of swimming around back then, so that's why in this life, I sink like a stone when I try to swim.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I don't feel as bad when I think about it that way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Some fish look kind of ugly, though. I'm not a fan.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis and I discuss the concept of past lives for a while.
Hum♪ Hum hum hum♪
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Under the red hot sun♬
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: What song is that?
You and me, just two of us♬
Oh, this little ditty?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: It's from a singer I used to be obsessed with.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: What the...?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: You know this song, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'm stunned! It's not a very popular song.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: It's from a singer I used to be obsessed with.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis and I sing together for a while.
Commander, I just saw a bird I've never seen before!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: When it flew past, it made this warbling sound, like "Huoh, huoh!"
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I wanna test you: do you know what kind of bird it was?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: A seagull.
A sparrow.
Oh! I didn't know we had an amateur ornithologist in our midst.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: The only reason I'm familiar with it is because Helm told me about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: She said that since seagulls live by the sea, we rarely get the chance to see them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: But they have a very unique call.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Er... Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: we've spent more than enough time up on the surface, so I'm sure you've seen your fair share of sparrows.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Sparrows don't go "huoh, huoh", they go "chirp chirp".
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: According to Helm, what I saw recently is a seagull.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I discuss seagulls with Anis for a while.
Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: what do you think of my swimsuit?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: It's so nice that it's almost a shame to wear it. You should store it away safely and treasure it.
You should take good care of it so you can keep wearing it in the future.
What?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: No way, no how! I won't get burned twice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: If I keep treating it like a piece of treasure, it only means I won't be able to wear it at all in the end.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: My thoughts exactly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Now you know why I've been so coy about wearing it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you like it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I discuss swimsuits with Anis for a while.
Commander, something's happened.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I think I've grown addicted to drinking soda on the beach.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: What if I find out I don't like soda as much when we return to the Outpost?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: You can just come back to the seaside again.
Something tells me you're gonna keep drinking soda no matter where you are.
Thanks for saying that, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'm so touched...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Even if I never end up going to the beach again, I won't blame you for it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, you're probably right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'm a hopeless soda addict, and I'll be knockin' 'em back for years to come.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: But that's not really what I'm getting at.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: What I'm trying to say is that drinking a soda is even better when you're at the beach.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I thought you'd pick up on that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis and I have a nice chat.
Even the most serene surroundings often have a dark underbelly hidden just underneath.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Well, I have a bloodcurdling story to share with you, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis! Be-behind you!
Lay it on me.
Gaahhh!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: You scared the bejesus out of me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Well, you gave me quite the fright as well when you grabbed me and threw yourself in my arms.
I only did that because you frightened me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Let's just take a breather and relax until I calm down.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: It's late at night, and you're alone in the Commander's Room.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Suddenly, there's a knock on the door. On the other side, a voice claims to have found a note, and they walk in.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: In comes a figure who raises their hand and slowly moves towards you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Commander, are you all right? I haven't even gotten to the scary part yet, but you look as white as a sheet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I think I've experienced this story in my dreams.
Whoa, no kidding! You think it's some kind of premonition, maybe?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, you're more easily scared than I thought.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis continues to regale me with bone-chilling stories.
Mmmm, nothing beats a good barbecue!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Food on the surface just hits different.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: What's the tastiest thing you've sampled up here so far?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Grilled seafood.
Barbecue.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Ever since we got here, I've had enough seafood to last multiple lifetimes, so I'm a bit over it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Did I really just say that I was tired of food from the surface?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Man, it's scary how fast we can get used to, and move past, things.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: For all Neon babbles on about firepower, it turns out she's got a real knack for cooking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Would you like another one?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I have a good time talking about food with Anis.
Ugh, the sun's a real scorcher today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Can you apply some sunscreen on my back?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Sure. Turn over.
Do Nikkes even need sunscreen?
Okay!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Just keep your mind out of the gutter, and be sure to apply it evenly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: No,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: but did you ever consider the real reason why I was asking?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Why don't you think it over again and reconsider?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I spend some time applying sunscreen on Anis.
Ahahaha!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Come and get me, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'm gonna get you!
What are you talking about?
So you know this game, too?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I saw it on TV and have always wanted to try it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: All right, come try and catch me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Come on,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: put those legs in motion
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: and come catch me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I run after Anis for a while, attempting to catch her.
Check this out!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I made this sand castle all by myself. What do you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: ... Castle? Where?
It's breathtaking. I feel like we could move in.
It's right there on the ground! Can't you see?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: It may not be as majestic as a real castle, but what can you expect when it's made of sand?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh* Well, you're nothing if not frank.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I suppose that's part of your charm, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: ... That's laying it on a bit thick, don't you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: You don't actually think you could live in this, do you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Like for real?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I join Anis and play in the sand for a while.
The more I look at Rapi's swimsuit, the more I like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: How should I put it... it's very... tasteful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: What do you think, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I personally prefer your swimsuit, Anis.
Rapi's swimsuit is indeed very cool.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I guess I'll just have to be more confident about my swimsuit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Heehee, I should go show it off to Rapi.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: You think so too?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Wait a second. I need to get Rapi to take off her swimsuit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis runs over to Rapi.
Commander, look!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Yan couldn't peel her eyes off this thing, so I snagged it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Do you know what it is?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: A pearl?
A nice-looking rock?
Good eye!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Apparently this is used a lot for jewelry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Isn't it gorgeous?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'm disappointed in you, Commander. I thought you'd be more perceptive.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Yan would never be interested in an ordinary hunk of rock.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Judging by how shiny it is, it must be some kind of gemstone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis and I continue to admire the gemstone.
Hey!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: *Slap*
Ahahaha! You should see the look on your face, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: ... Is this a starfish?
I can't see! Help!!
Yep.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I saw Anchor slinging starfish and thought I'd give it a try,
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: but your reaction is way more subdued than I thought it'd be. That's no fun.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Can I throw one more?
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: It's just a cute lil' starfish. You can pry it off using your hands.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I saw Anchor slinging starfish and thought I'd give it a try.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Pfff...
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: I'm sorry, it's just that you're so adorable when you're confused.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: You can throw one at me the next time, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: You've got my permission.
adviseScripts.speaker: Anis

adviseScripts.text: Anis and I take turns tossing starfish at one another.
